document.full_text: left-wing nationalist ollanta humala has gained a narrow lead in peru's presidential race two weeks before voting but he would struggle to win a runoff, according to two polls published on sunday.
document.title: humala has narrow lead in peru race: polls
lines_and_colors: left-wing nationalist ollanta humala has gained a narrow lead in peru's presidential race two weeks before voting but he would struggle to win a runoff, according to two polls published on sunday.
